Subject: EPP Agent for Ubuntu
Description:
Dear Sir or Madam,

We would like to distribute the EPP Agent on Ubuntu.
We have already received and successfully tested version 2.2.0.60000 for this purpose.

Could you please let us know if this is the latest version for 
Ubuntu 20.04 (Focal)
Ubuntu 22.04 (Jammy) 
Ubuntu 24.04 (Noble)
and whether it is supported on the above-mentioned systems.

If a newer version is available, please provide the setup files.

Regards

Anatoli Lorenz
Solution_Comment__c: Provided different Linux agent builds and target release date for 5940 release.
